availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson was born in Kentucky and married Alice Nell on December 4, 1854 in Campbell County. He died in Campbell County.

bibl.p: Find A Grave,” Rev. John J. Nelson (January 13, 1832-August 8, 1878),” Memorial #94774436, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=94774436 (June 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, not stated, p.151; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Campbell County Marriages, p. 1.
